CustomField.formula: IF(Premium_Product_Price_Difference__c > 0,"(" & TEXT( floor( Premium_Product_Price_Difference__c ) ) + "." + right( TEXT( ( 1 + Premium_Product_Price_Difference__c - floor( Premium_Product_Price_Difference__c ) ) * 100 ), 2 ) & " " & TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode) &" adder)","")
CustomField.label: IPR Coverage Price Adder
